abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column reviews latest Facebook redesign; says that, despite expected grumbling that comes anytime it makes adjustments to the site, and some obvious issues, the recent changes are an improvement.
snippet: Any time a company with 800 million active customers makes the slightest shift, there’s bound to be howls of protest. Let’s review the latest changes and see if they’re worth the teeth-gnashing.
lead_paragraph: Any time a company with 800 million active customers makes the slightest shift, there’s bound to be howls of protest. Let’s review the latest changes and see if they’re worth the teeth-gnashing.

headline.seo: Facebook Changes Inspire More Grumbling - State of the Art
